title: Transfer your driving instructor registration to Great Britain

details.description: Transfer your European Community (EC) driving instructor registration to Great Britain.
details.more_information:
It costs £300.

The online service is available from 6am to 11:30pm.

You’ll also need to send:

  • a photocopy of your passport with the relevant residency page
  • a photocopy of your EC driving instructor certificate
  • a photocopy of your driving licence
  • a short letter with details of your EC driving instruction career, including dates and qualifications gained
  • a recent passport-sized photograph with your name written on the back

There’s a different process to transfer a Great Britain or European Union registration to Northern Ireland.
details.introduction: Transfer your European Community (EC) driving instructor registration to Great Britain.
details.alternate_methods:
##Apply by post

To apply to transfer your registration by post, download the application form and send it to the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).

$D [Download ‘ADI 37EC - Application to transfer EC driving instructor registration to Great Britain register’ (PDF, 380KB)](http://assets.dft.gov.uk/dsa-bl/dsa_adi_37ec.pdf "Download ‘ADI 37EC - Application to transfer EC driving instructor registration to Great Britain register’ (PDF, 380KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

You’ll also need to send a:

- photocopy of your passport with the relevant residency page
- photocopy of your EC driving instructor certificate
- photocopy of your driving licence
- short letter with details of your EC driving instruction career, including dates and qualifications gained
- a recent passport-sized photograph with your name written on the back

$A

EC ADI Applications
Driving Standards Agency
The Axis Building
112 Upper Parliament Street
Nottingham
NG1 6LP

$A

*[EC]: European Community
*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor

details.description: Becoming an instructor, applying for licences, booking tests and rules

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
